Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12900 affecting package python3 3.7.11-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-12900 affecting package python3 3.7.11-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.7.13-1, affected by CVE-2019-12900
